segments.text: Hello , this is Mr . Smith in Room 502 . Please send up a bellboy . I'm checking out . What time is checking out time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Checking out time is twelve . Guests will avoid an additional days room charge by checking out on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's nearly 12:00 now . Will I be charged extra ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We won't charge any extra if you'd vacate the room by two o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . May I leave my baggage here until Thursday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We can put it in our storage room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will there be any extra charge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There will be no charge on baggage left by guests who have checked out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Please prepare my bill and I will be right down to pay it .
segments.speaker: S1
